title: Disconnected with internet up. Party of 3 in same Net.
body:
Me and my buddies were just doing a match of league.
Suddenly DC'd for about 3-4 minutes. By the time we came back the enemy team had already won.
No firewalls, no router issues, no internet loss.

This happened **yesterday **too, which apparently was a** server-wide problem.**
_But this time we didn't notice anyone else DC'ing._

This is only a problem we've experienced recently, the worst we experience is sudden spikes of ping whenever we're doing heavy usage. Not this long tho. Never.

How come this is happening? I understand its only human to err but I ain't gonna play if I'm losing the matches for other people, risking get a leave and overall giving free wins when we're so far ahead like we did in this last match.

**_I appreciate any information regarding the issue :)_**

Info Edit: The issue was basically a DC'ing issue, and it kept telling me to check my connection.

replies.body: I'm having this issue for the last 2 weeks of playing, my network is fine and everything, the only place I disconnect is the game itself so every now and then I miss like 30 seconds to a minute of play, no ping change or anything either

We've received reports that Cox may be experiencing ISP issues for some players in Arizona, in case you might be impacted by this.  I don't have any further info to share right now, but be prepared for possible disconnections or similar issues.  I'll offer updates if any come my way in the meantime.

Oh dear Cox.
Well thanks for the info Mr. Porocles :) Really happy to receive a quick response. We'll just have to be patient in case we give out free wins. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Oh btw, will we get leaves from this kind of things? I know it's an anomaly you guys are not responsible for, but then again neither are we. 
Hao2approach?

Leaverbuster isn't something that deactivates at any time, so isn't something that would be negated regardless of it being an ISP or server issue.  However, in cases of widespread issues like something with our servers, [loss prevention](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753014-Loss-Prevented) can be enabled.  This is something that is done by our devs- not support, and would only activate for games after being enabled.  

Your best approach would be to bookmark our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page or your ISP's support site and make the best decision for you.  Personally, I wouldn't risk a ranked game knowing that an issue is on-going.  Let me know if that clears things up!

Yep. We got that in mind, been playing only ARAMs and honestly, its not even worth it atm. 
Gonna wait a few days, see if it gets fixed up because we're salty over here with all the connection issues. Basically every teamfight we lose the connection like 3 seconds. So we just keep losing. A lot. 
Anyways we'll have to play something else for now. Thanks Porocles :)
